TEXT.S: cinsali' pitu hi cinsali' myan. uba mu ga kba' ci cminun takil. uya mu ga kba' ci cminun pala. yaba mu hiya ga musa mtiyow krryax. yaya mu ga mlahang sali'. kinan ro suyan mu likuy ro sswe mu kneril ga, mso'un myan musa mowas pn'wasan biru krryax, 'oyat ro knble'an ci inyanux na cinsali' myan.
